summary: In this offshoot of the 1950s "claymation" cartoon series, the crazy Blockheads threaten to ruin Gumby's benefit concert by replacing the entire city of Clokeytown with robots.
cast: Dal McKennon|Art Clokey|Gloria Clokey|Manny La Carruba|Alice Young|Janet MacDuff|Patti Morse|Bonnie Rudolph|David Ozzie Ahlers|David Archer|Lillian Nicol|Rick Warren
title: Gumby 1
